short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to quickly and easily generate PDF documents from plain text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool lets you generate a simple PDF document from plain text that you've pasted or typed into an input box.

The generated PDF is automatically downloaded to your local computer after generation. 

You can also generate a PDF by selecting text on a web page and then choosing "Generate PDF" from the right-click context menu.
